citeinfo.origin: Shelby Hammett, University of Miami, Rosenstiel School of Marine and Atmospheric Science, Researcher
citeinfo.title: flkeys_LiveCoralCover_21Nov2014
citeinfo.othercit: This dataset was produced as part of a master's thesis for the Rosenstiel School of Marine and Atmospheric Science.

descript.abstract: This dataset is a spatial interpolation of the average percent live coral cover across the Florida Reef Tract from the Upper Keys through the Dry Tortugas. This dataset was synthesized from data collected by the Florida Reef Resilience Program (FRRP) and the Coral Reef Evaluation and Monitoring Project (CREMP). Percent coral cover was calculated for the benthic habitat features from the Fish & Wildlife Commision's Unified Florida Reef Tract Map v1.2.
descript.purpose: Created for the coastalresilience.org website, to support planning for coastal resilience projects and to support the use of the Coastal Defense wave attenuation app on the website.

idinfo.accconst: The Nature Conservancy makes no warranty as to the currency, completeness, accuracy or utility of any specific data. This disclaimer applies both to individual use of the data and aggregate use with other data.

idinfo.datacred: Shelby Hammett, University of Miami, Rosenstiel School of Marine and Atmospheric Science
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.2.2.3552

srcinfo.srccontr: Florida Reef Resilience Program (FRRP) coral size and percent mortality data.
Coral Reef Evaluation and Monitoring Project (CREMP) coral demographic and percent cover data.
The Fish and Wildlife Commision's Unified Florida Coral Reef Tract Map (Unified Reef Map) Version 1.2.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: This is the percent mean coral cover for the feature (calculated). A value of -2 represents a feature with no data available.
Length of feature in internal units.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.
